TextElement.Str: Turn off animation for faster transition and battery saving
Add more stuffs to wakelocks to save battery and reduce idle drain(exp)
Any option selected here will be applied each time you change a profile
Switch ram booster to hardcore boosting( might restart your launcher)
Revert back to stock default settings and transition animation ?

Action.Str:
settings put global window_animation_scale 0
settings put global transition_animation_scale 0
settings put global animator_duration_scale 0
If it takes too long then exit using the right top button and try again...

TextElement.Str:
+ Vulmax is a spectrum like app which can be used to adjust battery and perfomance of your device without rebooting.
+ Restarting your device will undo all the effects done by the app
+ When using for the first if the app is taking too long to apply any profile just force stop the app and relaunch
+ app may show its build for older version of android its completely fine
+ As this app is made with my phone it may not fit your screen or even look bad
Turn on device's default battery saver also
Turn on device's default battery saver also
